name: Cardioid - speedrun edition
description:
A racing game controlled by mouse. You can control everything with it.  Also, don't forget to get the blue circles, they are checkpoints! Web-version is buggy, Download for best performance!

-Get the blue circles, they are checkpoints!

-Try to use shortcuts, don't always go from the track

-Use normal mode () when fuel is less.

Hover over the pedals/mechanics in the bottom left and change mechanic/state.

- Normal mode

+ slower but consumes less fuel

- Turbo mode

+ Faster but uncontrolled (especially when drifting and stopping) and consumes more fuel

-Dash mode

+So fast but so uncontrolled (especially when rotating) and consumes more fuel.
